explains: n. 面对面的人；相对着；两人对座的长椅
prep. 关于；和……面对面；同……相比

sentences.en: They conferred with the accountant vis-a-vis the proposed budget.
sentences.cn: 他们与会计商量有关预算提案的事。

sentences.en: Table 3: Assessment of OMG standards vis-a-vis the required EA model.
sentences.cn: 表3：vis - A - vis所需ea模型的OMG标准评估。

sentences.en: However, what if Banks use their increased excess reserves to pay down their debt vis-a-vis their clients?
sentences.cn: 然而，如果银行利用其增多的超额储备金来偿还所欠客户的债务，结果又如何呢？
